name: Gun Harvester
description:
Grow flowers, defeat them, buy more and repeat!

Defend yourself against zombie garden gnomes! (they say that your flowers can kill them too)

This game was created during  ludum dare 52 and was created in less than 3 days.

CONTROLS

  • WASD - Movement
  • Q - Select crop
  • E - Shop
  • Mouse left - Shoot
  • Mouse right - Plant crops
